channel.title: Breakfast world

item.title: The perfect crepes
item.description: You'll make the tastiest crepes with this recipe

item.title: Making pancakes
item.description: Light, fluffy and help you start you day right!

item.title: Breakfast makes you smarter
item.description: Studies show that kids who eat breakfast everyday are more alert in school, less tired, less anxious and do better on tests. They are 10% less likely to experience memory and attention span problems than kids who skip breakfast. In short, kids who eat breakfast are smarter.
